name: Limited (IceVayne Games)
description:
Limited Time, Limited Space, Limited Clues, Limited Options

Running of of time, Running out of Clues

The building’s on fire and will collapse in 5 minutes. Your helicopter can only hold 7 people. You suspect one of the people on the floor is the arsonist.

In 5 minutes the building burns. Your helicopter holds only 7 people. Someone on the floor is the arsonist. Can you figure out which one?

You have limited time, limited clues, limited options and limited space…

Don’t save the arsonist.
